page.title: 09OLD PEOPLES HOME FARNBOROUGH
page.content: The old people's home was once a youth hostel and has been open for eight years. Many of the residents moved to{ {Farnborough}during the{Second World {War}to work in the{Royal Aircraft {Establishment.} They now live in independent flats which have a living room, bathroom,and a bedroom. In the bathroom there is a special low bath so that the old folk can get into the bath easily.They have their own furniture,they cook their own meals, but the flats are cleaned for them. They have a tannoy system so that they can reach the warden if they are in difficulty. Their life is not dull, Mondays and Tuesdays is {bingo,}Wednesday is { {coffee morning,}Thursday is{shopping, Friday is{music night,}and on Sunday is{visiting}day, when their relatives come and take them out.
